full_text: RECEIPT OF OBLICOR - RETURN OF UNITED STATES BONES OR NOTES DEPOSITED AS SECURITY ON IMMIGRATION BOND I. Name and title of Immigration Officer 2. Receipt Number LOS 7421 3. City and State Michael H. Landon, Jr. Los Angeles, CA District Director 4. Date August 29, 1972 5. Name of alien Juan QUINTANA-SANCHEZ 6. A-File 7. Immigration bond: Baltazar DIAZ de QUINTANA A34 038 282T Date 08-29-72 FOIA (b) (6) FOIA (b)(6) 283, Type Public Charge 8. UNITED STATES BONDS OR NOTES (State form of assignment, if registered Said United States bonds/notes are assigned Title of Bonds/Notes Coupon or Total Registered Denomination Serial No. Face Amount Interest Dates U.S. Treasury Bond 42-60 $1,000.00 $1,000.00 71815E 2-15/8-15 of 1987-92 at 41/2. Dated 08-15-62. 11 42-60 $1,000.00 $1,000.00 71816F 11 11 42-60 $1,000.00 $1,000.00 71817H 11 " 42-60 $1,000.00 $1,000.00 71818J 11 11 42-60 $500.00 $500.00 8592B 11 (If this space is insufficient for enumeration of bonds/notes, use separate sheet and securely affix same hereto) 9. RETURN OF SECURITY Name and address of obligor The undersigned hereby acknowledges receipt from the above- named immigation officer of the above-described securities Romualdo QUINTANA-DIAZ deposited as security on above named immigration bond 1126 South Kern Avenue filed with the Immigration and Naturalization Service on be- Los Angeles, CA 90022 half of the above-named alien. Reincells Signature of obligor Form 1-306 (Rev. 5-1-69) To: A-File attached to original immigration bond form.
